member.name: IVisualTreeService2.GetProperty
member.summary: Gets the effective value of the specified dependency property.
member.param: The dependency object to get the property value from.
The index of the property to get the value from.
The effective value of the property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IVisualTreeService2.GetPropertyIndex
member.summary: Gets the property index for the specified property name.
member.param: The dependency object to get the property index from.
The name of the dependency property for which to get the index.
The index of the specified property.

returns.para: The possible return codes include, but are not limited to, the values shown in the following table.

listheader.description: No property with propertyName was found, or the property cannot be applied to object.

member.name: IVisualTreeService2.RenderTargetBitmap
member.summary: Returns an image that represents the object described by handle, or returns an error if the object does not have or cannot provide such an image.
member.param: The handle associated with the visual for which the caller is requesting a bitmap.
A flag that specifies whether only the texture associated with the visual should be rendered, or whether the texture and its children should be rendered.
The maximum width, in pixels, of the returned bitmap.
The maximum height, in pixels, of the returned bitmap.
The structure containing the requested bitmap information as well as information pertaining to that bitmap.

returns.para: The possible return codes include, but are not limited to, the values shown in the following table.

listheader.description: The method succeeded. ppBitmapData will be set to an IBitmapData containing an image.
The image could not be acquired or converted. ppBitmapData will be set toNULL.
handle does not refer to an object that can return an image, the options value is invalid, orppBitmapData is NULL.

member.name: IVisualTreeService2.ReplaceResource
member.summary: Replaces an existing resource with a new one of the same type.
member.param: The dictionary that contains the resource to replace.
The key of the resource to replace.
The value to replace the resource with.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IVisualTreeService2
member.summary: Represents additional capabilities of an IVisualTreeService object.
